org.sakaiproject.citation.api

Interface SearchDatabaseHierarchy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSearchManager.BasicSearchDatabaseHierarchy

    public interface SearchDatabaseHierarchy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ROOT_CATEGORY_ID 
      static String ROOT_CATEGORY_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchCategory getCategory(String categoryId)
      Returns the category within this hierarchy with the given category id

      Returns a list containing all categories in this hierarchy.

      Returns the default category in this hierarchy.

      Returns the number of hierarchical levels in this hierarchy.

    • Field Detail

      • ROOT_CATEGORY_NAME

        static final String ROOT_CATEGORY_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROOT_CATEGORY_ID

        static final String ROOT_CATEGORY_ID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getCategory

        SearchCategory getCategory(String categoryId)
        Returns the category within this hierarchy with the given category id
        Parameters:
        categoryId - id of category to check
        Returns:
        SearchCategory within this hierarchy with given category id; null if the category id is not found in this hierarchy

      • getNumLevels

        int getNumLevels()
        Returns the number of hierarchical levels in this hierarchy.
        Returns:
        number of hierarchical levels in this hierarchy. One less than the number returned provides the number of categorization levels - examples:
        • return value of 1 indicates there are just databases (no categorization)
        • return value of 5 indicates there are 4 categorization levels

      • getNumMaxSearchableDb

        int getNumMaxSearchableDb()
        Returns the maximum number of searchable databases within this hierarchy. This number defaults to 8 for now.
        Returns:
        max number of searchable databases within this hierarchy

      • getCategoryListing

        List getCategoryListing()
        Returns a list containing all categories in this hierarchy. This list can be used to iterate through the entire hierarchy.
        Returns:
        list containing the SearchCategory objects in this hierarchy.

      • getDefaultCategory

        SearchCategory getDefaultCategory()
        Returns the default category in this hierarchy. A default category will contain at least one database and no sub-categories.
        Returns:
        Default category in this hierarchy, or null if it does not exist.

      • isSearchableDatabase

        boolean isSearchableDatabase(String databaseId)
        Determines whether or not the given database is within this hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        databaseId - database id to check
        Returns:
        true if the database exists in this hierarchy, false if it does not

      • getRepository

        org.osid.repository.Repository getRepository()
        Get the Repository associated with this hierarchy
        Returns:
        Repository associated with this hierarchy

      • isConfigured

        boolean isConfigured()
        Determines whether or not this hierarchy is properly configured. This hierarchy could not be properly configured if the config xml files are not found or there is an error in parsing them.
        Returns:
        true if hierarchy is properly configured, false otherwise.
